entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Fuzzing] NrbfDecoderFuzzer: The output char buffer is too small to contain the decoded characters #107515
  • 'dynamic' keyword not working as expected #107512
  • JsonSchemaExporter.GetJsonSchemaAsNode cannot output array of fields for enum types with FlagsAttribute #107508
  • Rethrow stack trace reporting difference between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #107507
  • Random crash in native aot runtime code on win-x86 #107506
  • Performance of EVentSource (WriteEvent) is slow when compared across Amazon Linux distros #107505

Closed

  • JIT: cmp + jump + jump #101160
    Future
  • JIT: Simplify loop canonicalization #107175
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107514
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert some handle APIs from FCalls to fast FCall and slow QCall #107513
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Avoid using OpenThread for out of process SetThreadContext debugging #107511
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove unused declarations from clsload.hpp #107509
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement getClassAssemblyName #106959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107492
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert `WaitHandle` FCalls to QCalls #107488
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging][android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #107450
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] fix hang when `prepare_to_change_heap_count` fails #107485
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107500
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.10
  • Convert Thread FCalls to QCalls #107495
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable UnitTest_GVM_TypeLoadException for fullAOT jobs #107502
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2533437 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
